text: Déwé Gorodey (1 June 1949 – 14 August 2022) was a New Caledonian teacher, writer, feminist and politician. She was the Vice President of New Caledonia from 2001 to 2009. Gorodey died on 14 August 2022 at the age of 73.Mort de Déwé Gorodey, figure de la littérature et de l'indépendantisme de Nouvelle- Calédonie ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2022 deaths Category:People from New Caledonia Category:Vice presidents Category:Feminist writers Category:Teachers
title: Déwé Gorodey
